Package com.group1.froggy.app.controllers

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.group1.froggy.app.controllers.GlobalExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Centralized exception handler for controllers.

Maps common application and validation exceptions to appropriate HTTP responses. Most handlers return a ProblemDetail or ValidationDetail so the API responses are consistent.

    • invalidCredentialsException

      @ExceptionHandler(InvalidCredentialsException.class) public org.springframework.http.ProblemDetail invalidCredentialsException(InvalidCredentialsException e)
      Handle invalid credentials and return a 401 ProblemDetail.

      We intentionally use 401 (Unauthorized) to avoid exposing whether the resource exists.

      Parameters:
      e - the invalid credentials exception
      Returns:
      a ProblemDetail with HTTP 401 status
